title: Killer at large
creator_credit: Frank Jacoby, Alistair Cooke and United Nations Television
brief_description: A genial and unsuspecting businessman brings smallpox from Asia to Europe and triggers an international manhunt in which the health authorities of many countries cooperate with the Epidemic Warning Service of the World Health Organisation.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Jacoby, Alistair Cooke and United Nations Television
